title: iPhone 16 Pro Max
description: Experience the next generation of mobile technology with the iPhone 16 Pro Max. Featuring a stunning ProMotion XDR display, the powerful A18 Bionic chip, and a revolutionary camera system.

title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
description: Unleash your creativity with the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra. The ultimate smartphone with a built-in S Pen, an incredible 200MP camera, and the brightest display ever on a Galaxy.

title: iPhone 16
description: The standard iPhone 16 is a powerhouse, offering fantastic performance with the A17 chip, a beautifully bright display, and a dual-camera system that captures stunning photos in any light.

title: MacBook Pro 14-inch (M4 Pro)
description: The new MacBook Pro with the M4 Pro chip delivers game-changing performance for pro workflows. It features a brilliant Liquid Retina XDR display and all the ports you need.

title: Samsung Galaxy Book4 Pro 16-inch
description: Lightweight design, heavyweight performance. The Galaxy Book4 Pro features a stunning Dynamic AMOLED 2X touchscreen and Intel Core Ultra processors for ultimate productivity.

title: MacBook Air 13-inch (M3)
description: Supercharged by the M3 chip, the MacBook Air is the perfect everyday laptop. It's incredibly thin and light, with a silent, fanless design and up to 18 hours of battery life.

title: Apple Watch Series 10
description: The future of health is on your wrist. Apple Watch Series 10 features groundbreaking health sensors, a brighter always-on display, and advanced fitness tracking capabilities.

title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 Classic
description: Timeless design meets modern tech. The Galaxy Watch 7 Classic brings back the beloved rotating bezel, paired with advanced sleep tracking, and a durable sapphire crystal display.

title: Apple Watch Ultra 3
description: Built for endurance, exploration, and adventure. The Apple Watch Ultra 3 features a rugged titanium case, precision dual-frequency GPS, and the longest battery life of any Apple Watch.

title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 41 Women's Running Shoe
description: Feel the responsive energy with the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 41. It’s engineered for every runner, offering a smooth ride with springy cushioning for your daily miles.

title: Elegant High Heel Stilettos
description: Make a statement with these classic and elegant high heel stilettos. Perfect for formal events, parties, or a night out. Crafted from premium vegan leather.

title: Comfortable Summer Wedge Sandals
description: Enjoy comfort and style with these versatile wedge sandals. The soft footbed and stable platform make them ideal for all-day wear during the warm season.

title: Classic Aviator Sunglasses
description: A timeless accessory for any wardrobe. These aviator sunglasses feature a lightweight metal frame and polarized lenses for 100% UV protection and glare reduction.

title: Genuine Leather Belt for Men
description: Complete your look with this high-quality genuine leather belt. Features a classic silver-tone buckle and a durable strap that gets better with age.

title: Nike Sportswear Heritage86 Cap
description: The Nike Sportswear Heritage86 Cap is a classic 6-panel design with sweat-wicking support. It has a metal Swoosh ingot in the front and an adjustable closure for the perfect fit.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Men's Training T-Shirt
description: The Nike Dri-FIT T-Shirt helps keep you dry and comfortable from your first stretch to your last set. Soft fabric wicks sweat away from your skin.

title: Men's Slim Fit Stretch Denim Jeans
description: A modern take on classic denim. These slim fit jeans are made with stretch fabric for maximum comfort and mobility, perfect for any casual occasion.

title: Men's Regular Fit Long-Sleeve Oxford Shirt
description: A timeless wardrobe essential. This Oxford shirt is made from soft, breathable cotton and features a button-down collar, perfect for both smart and casual looks.

title: IKEA EKTORP 3-seat sofa
description: Timeless design and wonderfully thick, comfy cushions. The covers are easy to change, so buy an extra cover - or two, and change according to mood or season.

title: Modern Industrial Coffee Table
description: This coffee table combines a rustic wood-effect top with a sturdy black metal frame, bringing a touch of industrial chic to your living room. Features a lower shelf for extra storage.

title: IKEA BILLY Bookcase
description: A beloved classic, the BILLY bookcase is a versatile choice that never goes out of style. Perfect for storing your favorite books or displaying your cherished items. Adjustable shelves.

title: Samsung Family Hub Smart Refrigerator
description: More than just a refrigerator. See what's inside, manage your family’s calendars, stream music, and see who’s at the front door—all right from your fridge.

title: High-Speed Professional Blender
description: Unlock the full potential of your ingredients with this 1400W professional blender. Perfect for making smoothies, soups, and crushing ice in seconds. Comes with a 2L BPA-free jar.

title: Samsung Countertop Microwave Oven with Grill
description: A versatile microwave with a grilling function for a crispy finish. The ceramic enamel interior is scratch-resistant and easy to clean. 28L capacity.

title: Set of 3 Abstract Wall Art Prints
description: Elevate your space with this set of three matching abstract art prints. Featuring a minimalist design with gold accents, they are perfect for any modern living room or bedroom. Frames not included.

title: IKEA LAUTERS Floor lamp
description: This floor lamp with a dimmer provides a pleasant light. The solid wood base adds a warm, natural feel, and you can adjust the height to suit your needs.

title: Luxury Scented Candle Gift Set
description: Create a relaxing ambiance with this set of four scented candles. Made from natural soy wax and infused with essential oils. Scents include Lavender, Vanilla, Rose, and Sandalwood.

title: Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Serum
description: The #1 serum in the U.S. Experience the power of 7 serums in 1. Fights multiple signs of aging for a smoother, younger, more radiant look. For all skin types.

title: Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Face Moisturizer
description: A lightweight, non-greasy daily moisturizer that provides intense hydration. Formulated with hyaluronic acid and ceramides to lock in moisture and restore the skin's natural barrier.

title: Vitamin C Brightening Eye Cream
description: Reduce the appearance of dark circles and fine lines with this potent Vitamin C eye cream. Helps to brighten and depuff the delicate under-eye area for a refreshed look.

title: Argan Oil Hair Repair Serum
description: Tame frizz and flyaways with this nourishing Argan Oil hair serum. It adds shine, detangles, and protects hair from heat damage, leaving it smooth and silky.

title: Sulfate-Free Volumizing Shampoo
description: Gently cleanse your hair while adding body and volume. This sulfate-free formula is safe for color-treated hair and helps to strengthen fine, limp strands without weighing them down.

title: Deep Conditioning Keratin Hair Mask
description: Revive dry, damaged hair with this intensive deep conditioning mask. Enriched with keratin and natural oils, it repairs and strengthens hair, restoring its softness and shine.

title: Estée Lauder 'Beautiful' Eau de Parfum
description: The fragrance of a thousand flowers. A rich blend of Rose, Lily, Tuberose, and Orange Flower. Brightened with citrus, warmed by woods. A romantic, tender, and memorable scent.

title: Voyage - Eau de Toilette for Men
description: A fresh and invigorating scent for the modern man. Features top notes of crisp apple and water lotus, a heart of mimosa and linen, and a woody base of cedar and amber.

title: Unisex Citrus & Verbena Eau de Cologne
description: A bright, refreshing, and universally appealing fragrance. Zesty notes of Italian lemon and orange are softened by a fresh bouquet of verbena and geranium. Perfect for everyday wear.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Men's Running Shorts
description: Lightweight fabric and sweat-wicking technology team up to help keep you dry, comfortable and focused. Multiple pockets offer convenient storage for your essentials on the go.

title: Nike Pro Women's Training Tank Top
description: A breathable design with mesh on the back helps keep you cool during your toughest workouts. The slim fit follows your body's shape for a comfortable, distraction-free feel.

title: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece Hoodie
description: A closet staple, the Nike Sportswear Club Fleece Hoodie combines classic style with the soft comfort of fleece for an elevated, everyday look that you can wear every day.

title: Adjustable Dumbbells Set (24 kg)
description: Save space with this adjustable dumbbell set. Easily switch from 2.5 kg to 24 kg with a simple dial system. Perfect for a full-body workout at home. Price is for a single dumbbell.

title: Professional Non-Slip Yoga Mat
description: This premium yoga mat provides excellent grip and cushioning. Made from eco-friendly TPE material, it's lightweight, durable, and features alignment lines to help you perfect your poses.

title: Resistance Bands Set (5 Levels)
description: A set of 5 loop resistance bands for a variety of workouts. Each band has a different resistance level, from extra light to extra heavy. Ideal for fitness, yoga, and physical therapy.

title: Waterproof 40L Hiking Backpack
description: This versatile backpack is perfect for hiking and travel. Made from durable, water-resistant nylon, it features multiple compartments, comfortable shoulder straps, and a 40-liter capacity.

title: 2-Person Dome Tent for Camping
description: Easy to set up and lightweight, this 2-person tent is ideal for backpacking and weekend camping trips. Features a waterproof rainfly and good ventilation for comfort.

title: LED Headlamp with Rechargeable Battery
description: A super bright LED headlamp perfect for camping, running, and hiking at night. It's lightweight, waterproof, and features a long-lasting rechargeable battery with multiple light modes.

title: Wooden Alphabet & Number Puzzle Set
description: A fun and educational toy for toddlers. This colorful wooden puzzle set helps children learn the alphabet, numbers, and colors while developing hand-eye coordination and problem-solving skills.

title: STEM Building Blocks Kit (150 Pieces)
description: Encourage creativity and critical thinking with this 150-piece STEM building kit. Kids can build cars, robots, and more. Compatible with major brands. For ages 5 and up.

title: Kids First Science Experiment Kit
description: A safe and fun introduction to science. This kit includes 20 hands-on experiments, from creating a volcano to growing crystals. Includes all necessary tools and a child-friendly guide.

title: Settlers of Catan Board Game
description: The classic strategy board game of trade, building, and settlement. Players collect resources and use them to build roads, settlements, and cities. A modern classic for game night.

title: Ticket to Ride Board Game
description: A cross-country train adventure in which players collect and play matching train cards to claim railway routes connecting cities throughout North America. Fun for the whole family.

title: Classic Wooden Chess and Checkers Set
description: A beautiful 2-in-1 set featuring a handcrafted wooden board and pieces for both chess and checkers. The board folds for easy storage, making it perfect for travel or home use.

title: Galaxy Guardian Superhero Action Figure
description: This 12-inch Galaxy Guardian action figure features multiple points of articulation and movie-inspired details. A must-have for kids and collectors alike. Join the battle to save the universe!

title: Dinosaur Action Figure Playset (12 pieces)
description: A set of 12 realistic dinosaur figures, including T-Rex, Stegosaurus, and Triceratops. Made from durable, non-toxic plastic, perfect for imaginative play and educational purposes.

title: Ninja Master Collectible Figure
description: A highly-detailed, articulated Ninja Master figure. Comes with interchangeable hands, a katana, and shurikens. Perfect for display or creating epic ninja battles.

title: The Silent Patient by Alex Michaelides
description: A shocking psychological thriller of a woman’s act of violence against her husband—and of the therapist obsessed with uncovering her motive. A true page-turner.

title: Dune by Frank Herbert
description: A landmark science fiction novel, Dune is set on the desert planet Arrakis. It is a story of politics, religion, and man's relationship to nature as a young nobleman fights for control of the planet's most valuable resource.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing by Delia Owens
description: A heartbreaking coming-of-age story and a surprising tale of a possible murder. This novel is at once an exquisite ode to the natural world, a heartbreaking coming-of-age story, and a surprising tale of a possible murder.

title: Set of 12 Fine-Point Gel Pens
description: Enjoy a smooth, skip-free writing experience with this set of 12 assorted color gel pens. The 0.5mm fine point is perfect for journaling, note-taking, and detailed drawing. Quick-drying ink.

title: A5 Hardcover Dotted Notebook
description: The perfect companion for bullet journaling, note-taking, or sketching. This A5 notebook features a durable hardcover, 160 pages of thick, ink-proof dotted paper, and an elastic closure.

title: Mesh Desk Organizer with 6 Compartments
description: Keep your desk tidy with this stylish mesh organizer. It features 6 compartments and a sliding drawer, providing ample space for pens, paper clips, sticky notes, and other office supplies.

title: 24-Color Watercolor Paint Set with Brushes
description: A portable watercolor set perfect for artists of all levels. Includes 24 vibrant colors, a water brush pen, and a mixing palette, all in a compact case. Non-toxic and easy to blend.

title: Mixed Media Sketchbook (A4 Size, 100 Pages)
description: This versatile sketchbook is designed for a variety of mediums, including pencils, charcoal, watercolors, and acrylics. Features thick, acid-free paper and a durable spiral binding.

title: Set of 48 Professional Coloring Pencils
description: Unleash your creativity with this set of 48 premium coloring pencils. They feature soft, oil-based cores for smooth blending and layering. Perfect for adult coloring books and detailed artwork.
